Energy Audit Programme
Enerdy Audit Programme
(For Commercial and Industrial Customers only)
Now you get to save money where it counts the most! Opt for our Energy Audit programme that helps you identify energy saving opportunities at your own premises.
Every facility is unique in nature of operation and energy consumption. And only an energy audit specialist can identify inefficiencies in your equipments and provide you with customized recommendations for achieving energy savings.
Specialist Energy Audit Firms (approved by BEE) will conduct energy audit of your premises only at 25% cost!\
So, take the first step in controlling your energy consumption. Register for our Energy Audit Programme at discounted rates and track those energy guzzlers today!
Yes, I am a Tata Power Commercial/Industrial Customer. I am interested to carry out energy audit in my premises under Tata Power programme. Please send me the details of your programme.
